name: Mending Heart
baseMeaning: A red heart with a bandage on it, representing healing from emotional pain.
tldr: Healing, recovering from heartbreak, or getting better.

contextMeanings.meaning: Recovering from emotional pain or heartbreak.
Moving on from past relationship hurt.

platformNotes.note: Used in mental health and healing discussions.
Popular in self-care and recovery posts.
Common in healing and growth content.

generationalNotes.note: Used openly for mental health and healing journeys.
May interpret as simply a bandaged heart.
